page.title: 08NEW ROMNEY SECONDARY SCHOOL
page.content: THE SECONDARY SCHOOL IS SOUTHLANDS WITH A LOWER AND AN UPPER SCHOOL THE OLDEST PART OF THE SCHOOL WAS FOUNDED IN 1610.THE PUPILS AT THIS SCHOOL COME BY THE LIGHT RAILWAY OR BY BUS. AT THE LOWER SCHOOL THE AGE LIMIT IS 11-13,AT THE UPPER SCHOOL IT IS 13-18 YEARS.PUPILS AT BOTH SCHOOLS COME FROM ALL OVER THE MARSH.SOUTHLANDS HAS A SCHOOL UNIFORM AND THE COLOUR IS NAVY.THERE ARE 1500 OR MORE PUPILS AT THIS SCHOOL.THE SCHOOLS ARE BOTH A FEW MINUTES WALK FROM THE HIGH STREET. SOUTHLANDS SCHOOL IS A COMPREHENSIVE AND IT MEANS THAT PUPILS HAVE ALL SORTS OF ABILITIES.WHEN THEY LEAVE SOUTHLANDS THEY WILL EITHER TAKE CSE OR O AND A-LEVEL EXAMS.AFTER THAT THEY MIGHT GET A JOB OR GO OR GO TO COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY.
